definition[0]: the feeling of wanting or needing a drink
example[0]: Ice water is the only thing that really quenches my thirst  (=gets rid of it).
example[1]: We had worked up a thirst  (=done something that made us thirsty), and so we decided to stop for a beer.
example[2]: Maggie woke up with a raging thirst  (=an extremely strong thirst).
definition[1]: the state of not having enough to drink
example[3]: Many of the animals had died of thirst.
